TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: The ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport class represents an inter-site transport object.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all site links are bridged.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean"> value that indicates whether to bridge all site links. `true` if all site links are bridged; otherwise, `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases all resources that are used by the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: `true` if the managed resources should be released; `false` if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport FindByTransportType(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType transport) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that specifies the context for the search.
An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType"> object that specifies a transport type to find in the search.
Docs.summary: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport"> object for a given directory context and transport type.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport"> object for the item found. An <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException> exception is thrown if an object was not found.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry GetDirectoryEntry() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> object for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport> object.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> object that represents the directory entry for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport> object.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the replication schedule is ignored.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean"> value that indicates whether to ignore the replication schedule. `true` if the replication schedule is ignored; otherwise, `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the IgnoreReplicationSchedule is `true`, any site link availability schedules that have been configured are ignored, and all site links become always-available for replication. When set to `false`, any previously configured site link availability schedules go back into effect. If no site link availability schedules have been configured, setting this property has no effect.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save() cil managed

Docs.summary: Commits all changes to the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport"> object to the underlying directory store.

Gets a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkBridgeCollection"> object that contains all site link bridges for this <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport> object.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkBridgeCollection"> object that contains <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge> objects that represent site link bridges.

Docs.summary: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkCollection"> object that contains all site links for this <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport> object.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkCollection"> object that contains <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink> objects that represent site links.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the string representation of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType"> of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport> object.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that represents the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType> transport type of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport> object.

Docs.summary: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType"> object that represents the transport type for this <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport> object.
Docs.value: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType"> values that represents the transport type for this object.
